data: The sun was setting over Paris, a blood-red and violent-looking sun, like the face of a bully staring in at the window of a vast chill room.
H. De Vere (Henry De Vere) Stacpoole
Stacpoole, H. De Vere (Henry De Vere), 1863-1951
